Package de.aikiit.mailversendala

Class SendOut

java.lang.Object
de.aikiit.mailversendala.SendOut
public class SendOut extends Object
This class performs the actual mail sending and encapsulates all the technicalities to create and send out an email.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    SendOut(Mailing recipient)
    Create mail based on the given mailing recipient.

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String... args) throws Exception
      Test method to verify the actual mail creation and send out.
      Parameters:
      args - allows sending an email to a given mail address. One parameter is required.
      Throws:
      Exception - in case of errors.

    • send

      public void send() throws org.apache.commons.mail.EmailException
      Send out an email that contains only text contents.
      Throws:
      org.apache.commons.mail.EmailException - in case of errors.

    • sendComplex

      public void sendComplex() throws org.apache.commons.mail.EmailException, MalformedURLException
      Send out an email with plain text and HTML contents.
      Throws:
      org.apache.commons.mail.EmailException - in case of mail-related errors.
      MalformedURLException - in case of problem while generating the HTML-part of.
